description: This file defines the SyncService class responsible for synchronizing reading progress with a backend or database, designed for integration with a Flutter application.

classes.name: SyncService
classes.description: A service class extending ChangeNotifier, used to handle the synchronization of reading progress, currently stubbed for local demo purposes.

methods.name: syncProgress
methods.description: Public method to sync reading progress for a given book ID and page index, currently implemented as a stub.
